items.value: You are perfect
You are accepted as you are
You are growing
You are forgiven for everything your inner critic says is wrong
With all your imperfections
For this phase of growth
With everything that's in your head and heart
At this stage of growth
At this stage of development you are perfect
You are accepted as you are
You are fully approved just the way you are
You are completely and absolutely forgiven
Take a conscious breath
A moment of self-compassion can change my entire day. A string of such moments can change the course of my life
Self compassion is a skill that I can learn

With all my imperfections
For this phase of growth
With everything that's in my head and heart
At this stage of growth
At this stage of development I am perfect

I am good enough
I work enough
The energy I put into self compassion is enough to make me grow
No matter what my inner critic says
No matter what my inner critic says
My commitment is enough
I am patient with the process
My best is good enough
I am on a beautiful journey
It is okay for me to be kind to myself
You are doing the best that you can do
I receive warmth
I receive acceptance
I receive kindness
I receive affection
The effect of the Metta exercise is much larger than my inner critic can image
